titles.title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a Member, officer, or employee may not accept a gift or expense reimbursement from any entity which has an interest in actions taken by the Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

bill.summary: 11/7/1995--Introduced. Amends rule XLIII (Code of Official Conduct) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that such rule does not authorize a House Member, officer, or employee to receive a gift or an expense reimbursement from any entity which has an interest in actions taken by the Congress.
